roleset.name: make more western (new world), make more western (European-based cultures)
roleset.note: WESTERNIZE-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick based on 'activate'; adjectival usage 'westernised' based on BOLT-1. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4, (from westernize.01-v)
WESTERNIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, westernize.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from westernization.01-n)
WESTERNISED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from westernised.01-j)

example.name: westernize
example.text: He meant that [we]-2 should first westernize, then step back [*]-2 to look at tradition.
example.arg: then step back [*]-2 to look at tradition.

example.name: adjectival rel: westernised
example.text: Because it 's the most westernised , Israel .

example.name: both args
example.text: Maybe they'll choose a decent team for their "westernization" of Megaman, like gearbox.

roleset.name: relating to cultures that originated in Europe
roleset.note: WESTERN-J NOTES: Added by Julia for BOLT. Relation to 'westernize.01'. (from western.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Her style of dress was Western, disaffected, feminine (like virtually all Turkish women I'd befriended) and just a bit gothic.

roleset.name: relating to the old American west
roleset.note: WESTERN-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from western.02-j)

role.descr: entity identified as of the old west

example.name: arg1
example.text: Jimmy was a Sox fan, though his hat was western and said "Hopalong Cassidy" on the band.
